title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats when presented in a dynamic text item compared to data/text item. This inconsistency in formatting is causing confusion and potential inaccuracies in the displayed information.
EB: Datetime values should consistently adhere to the same format across all relevant components, specifically the dynamic text item and data/text item. This uniformity ensures clarity and accuracy in the presentation of datetime information.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text item containing datetime values from a table.
2. Insert a data/text item displaying the same datetime values.
3. Observe the discrepancy in the datetime format between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
